sources.title: Penal Code
sources.description: Regis Toomey in a poverty-row drama.

sources.title: Penal Code (1932) PRE-CODE HOLLYWOOD
sources.description:
tars: Regis Toomey, Helen Cohan, Pat O'Malley
Director: George Melford

Bob Palmer sends a letter to his mother postmarked Australia, but he is actually residing in a New York prison, serving a two year stretch for a crime that he did not commit! Upon his release, he returns home and renews his courtship with the daughter of a local financier who reinstates him at former position. However, an old rival has become vice president at the bank and is full of suspicions concerning Palmer's recent absence!

metadata.Plot: A young boy in a small town turns to a life of crime. After serving a prison sentence, he returns home determined to go straight but finds himself being blackmailed into a safecracking operation at a bank--organized by his romantic rival, who is planning to set him up to go back to prison again.
metadata.Writer: Edward T. Lowe Jr., F. Hugh Herbert
metadata.Actors: Regis Toomey, Helen Cohan, Pat O'Malley
